verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> that came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Hear <S%H8085><s%> ye the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, and <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and to the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>;

and <S%H559>say<s%> thou unto <S%H559>them<s%>, Thus saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: <S%H779>Cursed<s%> be the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H8085>heareth<s%> not the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H1285>covenant<s%>,

which I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I brought them <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, out of the <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H3564>furnace<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H8085>Obey<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H6680>them<s%>, according to all which I command <S%H5971>you<s%>: so shall ye be my people, and I will be your <S%H430>God<s%>;

that I may <S%H6965>establish<s%> the <S%H7621>oath<s%> which I <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto your <S%H1>fathers<s%>, to <S%H5414>give<s%> them a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%>, as at this <S%H3117>day<s%>. Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H559>I<s%>, and said, <S%H543>Amen<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7121>me<s%>, Proclaim all these <S%H1697>words<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and in the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H8085>Hear<s%> ye the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, and do <S%H6213>them<s%>.

For I <S%H5749>earnestly<s%> <S%H5749>protested<s%> unto your <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I brought them <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, even unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>, rising <S%H7925>early<s%> and <S%H5749>protesting<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H8085>Obey<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%>.

Yet they <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> <S%H5186>not<s%>, nor inclined their <S%H241>ear<s%>, but <S%H3212>walked<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> in the <S%H8307>stubbornness<s%> of their <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>: therefore I <S%H935>brought<s%> upon them all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, which I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them to <S%H6213>do<s%>, but they did them <S%H6213>not<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7195>me<s%>, A conspiracy is <S%H4672>found<s%> among the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and among the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

They are turned <S%H7725>back<s%> to the <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> of their <S%H7223>forefathers<s%>, who <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%>; and they are <S%H1980>gone<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H1004>them<s%>: the house of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> have <S%H6565>broken<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> which I <S%H3772>made<s%> with their <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H935>Behold<s%>, I will bring <S%H7451>evil<s%> upon <S%H3201>them<s%>, which they shall not be able to <S%H3318>escape<s%>; and they shall <S%H2199>cry<s%> unto <S%H8085>me<s%>, but I will not hearken unto them.

Then shall the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> and <S%H2199>cry<s%> unto the <S%H430>gods<s%> unto which they offer <S%H6999>incense<s%>: but they will not <S%H3467>save<s%> them at <S%H3467>all<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of their <S%H7451>trouble<s%>.

For according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of thy <S%H5892>cities<s%> are thy <S%H430>gods<s%>, O <S%H3063>Judah<s%>; and according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> have ye set <S%H7760>up<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%> to the shameful <S%H1322>thing<s%>, even <S%H4196>altars<s%> to burn <S%H6999>incense<s%> unto <S%H1168>Baal<s%>.

Therefore <S%H6419>pray<s%> not thou for this <S%H5971>people<s%>, neither lift <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H7440>cry<s%> nor <S%H8605>prayer<s%> for <S%H8085>them<s%>; for I will not hear them in the <S%H6256>time<s%> that they <S%H7121>cry<s%> unto me because of their <S%H7451>trouble<s%>.

What hath my <S%H3039>beloved<s%> to do in my <S%H1004>house<s%>, seeing she hath <S%H6213>wrought<s%> <S%H4209>lewdness<s%> with <S%H7227>many<s%>, and the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is <S%H5674>passed<s%> from <S%H7451>thee<s%>? when thou doest evil, then thou <S%H5937>rejoicest<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%>, A <S%H7488>green<s%> <S%H2132>olive-tree<s%>, <S%H3303>fair<s%> with <S%H8389>goodly<s%> <S%H6529>fruit<s%>: with the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1999>tumult<s%> he hath <S%H3341>kindled<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> upon <S%H1808>it<s%>, and the branches of it are <S%H7489>broken<s%>.

For <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, who <S%H5193>planted<s%> <S%H1696>thee<s%>, hath pronounced <S%H7451>evil<s%> against <S%H1558>thee<s%>, because of the <S%H7451>evil<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, which they have <S%H6213>wrought<s%> for themselves in provoking me to <S%H3707>anger<s%> by offering <S%H6999>incense<s%> unto <S%H1168>Baal<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> gave me <S%H3045>knowledge<s%> of <S%H3045>it<s%>, and I knew <S%H7200>it<s%>: then thou showedst me their <S%H4611>doings<s%>.

But I was like a <S%H441>gentle<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> that is <S%H2986>led<s%> to the <S%H2873>slaughter<s%>; and I <S%H3045>knew<s%> not that they had <S%H2803>devised<s%> <S%H4284>devices<s%> against <S%H7843>me<s%>, saying, Let us destroy the <S%H6086>tree<s%> with the <S%H3899>fruit<s%> <S%H3772>thereof<s%>, and let us cut him off from the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%>, that his <S%H8034>name<s%> may be no more <S%H2142>remembered<s%>.

But <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, who <S%H8199>judgest<s%> <S%H6664>righteously<s%>, who <S%H974>triest<s%> the <S%H3629>heart<s%> and the <S%H3820>mind<s%>, I shall <S%H7200>see<s%> thy <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> on <S%H1540>them<s%>; for unto thee have I revealed my <S%H7379>cause<s%>.

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> concerning the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H6068>Anathoth<s%>, that <S%H1245>seek<s%> thy <S%H5315>life<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thou shalt not <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, that thou <S%H4191>die<s%> not by our <S%H3027>hand<s%>;

therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, <S%H6485>Behold<s%>, I will punish <S%H970>them<s%>: the young men shall <S%H4191>die<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> by <S%H7458>famine<s%>;

and there shall be no <S%H7611>remnant<s%> unto <S%H935>them<s%>: for I will bring <S%H7451>evil<s%> upon the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H6068>Anathoth<s%>, even the <S%H8141>year<s%> of their <S%H6486>visitation<s%>.
